description:
Arts school graduate Ishimoto Miki lands a job at Holbein Entertainment Inc., where she is assigned to be the Sekko Boys` manager.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Visceral Allegory of Seven Years of My Artistic Life
Watashi no Geijutsuteki Jinsei no 7 Nenkan o Youyaku Suru Genjitsuteki Guui
私の芸術的人生の7年間を要約する現実的寓意
